/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are modern in design, with glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the urban landscape. The street itself is lined with trees, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene.
